body:
Hello all,

 Today I decided to not make a D.S, rather make a skin challenge! My challenge for all you wonderful people is; create a skin related to christmas! This competition is just for fun, not for any prize or something like that. Your skin can be as creative, colorful and cool as you want it to be! An example of a christmas skin is my skin. it's my old skin, but I have new green and red shades! I hope this competition is fun! Oh, by the way, I'll be judging by the amount of "christmas" that is integrated into your skin! Have fun! 

 Happy skin making! 

Peace!

-C_P

replies.body: Who said you needed green and red? Are you judging me by my skin color? Do you know how racist that is???

replies.body: @kycrafft, don't you know christmas colors are red and green and white? I'm not being racist. A mine craft skin does not technically a real race. Remember, I said "related to christmas." Not steve :P.  I hope you understand. And please remember, if you have something that's not related to the topic, please keep it in that wonderful mind of yours! Peace!
